template.name: New SilverStripe 4.x project _config.php template
template.description: A new SilverStripe project _config.php template

templates.template:
<?php
use SilverStripe\Forms\HTMLEditor\TinyMCEConfig;
use SilverStripe\Security\Member;
use SilverStripe\Security\PasswordValidator;

// remove PasswordValidator for SilverStripe 5.0
$$validator = new PasswordValidator();

$$validator->minLength(8);
$$validator->checkHistoricalPasswords(6);
Member::set_password_validator($$validator);


// Re-add a few components to the WYSIWYG
TinyMCEConfig::get('cms')->addButtonsToLine(1, array(
    '|',
    'undo',
    'redo'
));

TinyMCEConfig::get('cms')->insertButtonsBefore('paste', array(
    'cut',
    'copy'
));

TinyMCEConfig::get('cms')->setOption('contextmenu', TinyMCEConfig::get('cms')->getOption('contextmenu') . ' | cut copy paste pastetext');

template.name: New SilverStripe 4.x project _config.yml template
template.description: A new SilverStripe project _config.yml template

templates.template:
--- Name: mysite After: - "framework/*" - "cms/*" --- SilverStripe\View\SSViewer: themes: - '$$public' - "THEME NAME" - '$$default'
SilverStripe\Control\Email\Email: admin_email: "me@example.com"
SilverStripe\Core\Manifest\ModuleManifest: project: mysite
#--- #Name: mysite_dev #After: # - "#mysite" #Only: # environment: "dev" #--- # Uncomment the above to enable a section specific for when the site is in dev mode

template.name: New SilverStripe 4.x project Page class template
template.description: A new SilverStripe 4.x project Page class template

templates.template:
<?php
use SilverStripe\CMS\Model\SiteTree;
use SilverStripe\Security\Permission;

class Page extends SiteTree {
    public static $$db=array(
                           );
    
    public static $$defaults=array(
                                );
    
    /**
     * Gets whether the user is an administrator
     * @return bool True if the user is an admin false if not
     */
    public function getIsAdmin() {
        if(Permission::check('ADMIN')) {
            return true;
        }else {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

template.name: New SilverStripe 4.x theme config.rb template
template.description: A new SilverStripe theme config.rb template

templates.template:
# Require any additional compass plugins here. require 'compass-colors' require 'compass/import-once/activate'
project_type = :stand_alone # Set this to the root of your project when deployed: http_path = "/" css_dir = "css" sass_dir = "scss" images_dir = "images" javascripts_dir = "javascript" output_style = :compact
# To enable relative paths to assets via compass helper functions. Uncomment: relative_assets = true
# Disable comments in the output. We want admin comments to be verbose. line_comments = false
# Disable asset cache buster. Using :none doesn't work in some versions of compass. asset_cache_buster do |http_path, real_path| nil end
sourcemap = true
sass_options = { :unix_newlines => true }
Encoding.default_external = "utf-8"
# Removing all comments by applying a monkey patch to SASS compiler class Sass::Tree::Visitors::Perform < Sass::Tree::Visitors::Base # Removes all comments completely def visit_comment(node) return [] end end
module Compass::ImportOnce::Importer def find(uri, options, *args) uri, force_import = handle_force_import(uri.gsub(/^\(NOT IMPORTED\) /, '')) maybe_replace_with_dummy_engine(super(uri, options, *args), options, force_import) end end

template.name: New SilverStripe theme Navigation.ss template
template.description: A new SilverStripe theme Navigation.ss template

templates.template:
<% cached 'mainMenu', $$ID, $$SiteConfig.LastEdited, $$List('SilverStripe\CMS\Model\SiteTree').Max('LastEdited'), $$LastEdited, $$current_stage %>
    <% if $$SiteConfig.ContactPage %>
  • Contact Us
    • <% end_if %> <% loop $$Menu(1) %>
  • $$MenuTitle.XML <% if $$Children %>
      <% loop $$Children %>
    • $$MenuTitle.XML <% if $$Children %>
        <% loop $$Children %>
      • $$MenuTitle.XML
        • <% end_loop %>
      <% end_if %>
      • <% end_loop %>
    <% end_if %>
    • <% end_loop %>
<% end_cached %>

templates.template:
<%-- NOTE: Before including this, you will need to wrap the include in a with block --%> <% if $$MoreThanOnePage %>

<%-- --%><% if $$NotFirstPage %><%-- --%><%-- --%><% end_if %><%-- --%><% loop $$PaginationSummary %><%-- --%><% if $$CurrentBool %><%-- --%>$$PageNum<%-- --%><% else %><%-- --%><% if $$Link %><%-- --%>$$PageNum<%-- --%><% else %><%-- --%>...<%-- --%><% end_if %><%-- --%><% end_if %><%-- --%><% end_loop %><%-- --%><% if $$NotLastPage %><%-- --%><%-- --%><% end_if %><%-- --%>

<% end_if %>
